events.message: The customer reported a car accident involving their vehicle on highway 50 at approximately 7:45 AM, requesting to file a claim for damages.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident following verification of the incident details provided by the claimant.
A claims agent with extensive experience handling auto collisions was assigned to this case to ensure prompt and accurate processing.
Acknowledged receipt of the auto accident claim and welcomed the customer with an explanation of the upcoming procedures and timelines.
Requested the customer to submit police reports, photos of vehicle damage, and medical reports if any injuries occurred during the collision.
Received all requested documentation, including detailed accident report and photographs, enabling the claim to move forward with the review.
The investigation team began assessing the circumstances of the automobile collision to determine fault and verify damage extent.
Completed the investigation with a positive direction; evidence aligns with the customer’s claim, supporting their reported damages.
A settlement offer based on repair quotations and medical expenses was proposed to the customer for their review and consideration.
The customer responded positively to the settlement proposal, expressing satisfaction with the promptness and fairness of the offer.
Formal approval of the auto accident claim was granted after customer acceptance of the terms and settlement amount.
Processed and issued the settlement payment to the customer’s nominated bank account as per the approved claim conditions.
The auto accident claim was successfully closed following full payment and confirmation that the customer’s concerns were addressed.
